Boss_Drop.description: A pillar form by the shell of a Geo Hypostasis. It is composed of high-density Geo energy. This is the heaviest component of a Geo Element. Maybe the reason a Geo Hypostasis creates this polar out of its shell and raises itself is just to get closer to the sky, not to combat enemies.
Boss_Drop.name: Basalt Pillar

Common_1.description: A thick coating found on slimes. Most commonly seen material in elemental workshops.
Common_1.name: Slime Condensate

Common_2.description: Mildly purified slime secretions. Harmful to the skin. Please avoid direct exposure.
Common_2.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Slime Condensate)
- Dropped by Lv.40+ slimes
Common_2.name: Slime Secretions

Common_3.description: Concentrated slime essence. When left on its own, it will begin to move on its own.
Common_3.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Slime Secretions)
- Dropped by Lv.60+ slimes
Common_3.name: Slime Concentrate

Elite_1.description: A crude horn used by hilichurls to warn each other. Given the damage to the horn, it won't be warning anyone any time soon.
Elite_1.name: Heavy Horn

Elite_2.description: A metallic monster horn that can only be obtained from especially strong hilichurls, since blowing on the horn takes real strength.
Elite_2.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Heavy Horn)
- Dropped by Lv.40+ Mitachurls
Elite_2.name: Black Bronze Horn

Elite_3.description: A metallic horn with an ominous shine decorated with black crystals of an unknown source. It has hardly been used at all. It is likely a ceremonial item of the hilichurls'.
Elite_3.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Black Bronze Horn)
- Dropped by Lv.60+ Mitachurls
Elite_3.name: Black Crystal Horn

Forgery_1.description: The place now known as Stormterror's Lair was once the capital city of Decarabian, the God of Storms. Since this dream of prosperity was created entirely by his divine might, the broken pieces left behind by the shattering of that dream still possess great power.
Forgery_1.name: Tile of Decarabian's Tower

Forgery_2.description: Decarabian, the God of Storms, was content with the capital city he had raised, and accepted the worship of the people from atop his tower. But he knew not that the people did not bow to him out of respect or adoration.
Forgery_2.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Tile of Decarabian's Tower)
- Cecilia Garden (Monday/Thursday/Sunday)
Forgery_2.name: Debris of Decarabian's City

Forgery_3.description: Andrius once declared war upon Decarabian, but failed to even scratch the capital of the Lord of the Tower. If it were not for the song of freedom that shattered the city in an instant, Decarabian's dream would have gone on forever.
Forgery_3.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Debris of Decarabian's City)
- Cecilia Garden (Monday/Thursday/Sunday)
Forgery_3.name: Fragment of Decarabian's Epic

Forgery_4.description:
The people did not bow to Decarabian out of respect or adoration, but because the harsh winds had laid them low. This was the shattered dream and ambition of the Anemo Archon before the rise of Barbatos.
He tried so hard to make his dream come true, and so the fragments of that dream are still mighty.
Forgery_4.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Fragment of Decarabian's Epic)
- Cecilia Garden (Monday/Thursday/Sunday)
Forgery_4.name: Scattered Piece of Decarabian's Dream

Local_Speciality.description: The fruit of the Amakumo Grass, which grows on Seirai Island. You can hear it crackling with a tiny current if you hold it up to your ear.
Local_Speciality.name: Amakumo Fruit

Mastery_1.description:
Freedom is the spirit of the Land of the Wind.
The freedom to live is one of such. It is the freedom to live freely and healthily without concerns of one's own safety.
Mastery_1.name: Teachings of Freedom

Mastery_2.description:
Freedom is the spirit of the Land of the Wind.
The freedom of travel is one of such. It is the freedom to traverse the land freely without being obstructed.
Mastery_2.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Teachings of Freedom)
- Forsaken Rift (Monday/Thursday/Sunday)
Mastery_2.name: Guide to Freedom

Mastery_3.description:
Freedom is the spirit of the city of wind.
To sing is one such freedom. To sing on the land created by the Anemo Archon is to send your heart away with the song on the wind.
Mastery_3.obtained:
- Alchemy (3x Guide to Freedom)
- Forsaken Rift (Monday/Thursday/Sunday)
Mastery_3.name: Philosophies of Freedom

Weekly_Boss.description:
A claw from the Dragon of the East.
As it had once torn through the flesh of the shadow dragon Durin, it used to contain his vicious poison. However, thanks to your purification and healing, it is no longer toxic.
Weekly_Boss.name: Dvalin's Claw
